name: AndraPradesh
rules: Any Establishment/Employer employing 1 or more persons
All employees except employees working in part-time position,apprentice and managerial position

name: Chattisgarh
rules: Any Establishment/Employer employing 1 or more persons
All employees except in managerial/administrative/supervisory capacity drawing wages more than ₹ 10,000 per month

name: Chandigarh
rules: Any Establishment/Employer employing 1 or more persons
All employees who are drawing salary upto ₹ 15,000 per month

name: Delhi
rules: Any Establishment employing 5 or more persons
All employees except in managerial/administrative/supervisory capacity drawing wages more than ₹ 2,500 per month

name: Goa
rules: Any Establishment/Employer employing 1 or more persons
All employees except in managerial/administrative/supervisory capacity drawing wages more than ₹ 1,600 per month

name: Gujrat
rules: Any Establishment/Employer employing 10 or more persons
All employees except in managerial/supervisory capacity drawing wages more than ₹ 3,500 per month

name: Haryana
rules: Any Establishment/Employer employing 10 or more persons
All employees employed,directly by or through any agency,including a contractor for remuneration in any Factory/Est

name: Karnataka
rules: Any Establishment/Employer employing 50 or more persons
All employees who are employed for wages to do any work skilled/unskilled/manual/clerical,in an establishment

name: Kerala
rules: Any Establishment/Employer employing 1 or more persons

All employees under the purview of the Kerala Labour Welfare Fund Act, 1975. For Shops & Establishments under the purview of The Kerala Shops And Commercial Establishments Workers Welfare Fund Act,2006,Employee and Employer has to contribute ₹ 20 each, every month by 30 th and due date is 5 th of every month.

name: MadhyaPradesh
rules: Any Establishment/Employer employing 1 or more persons
All employees except employees in managerial/supervisory capacity drawing wages more than ₹ 10,000 per month

name: Maharashtra
rules: Any Establishment/Employer employing 5 or more persons
All employees except in managerial/supervisory capacity. Contributions vary based on wage upto ₹ 3,000 and above ₹ 3,000 per month

name: Orissa
rules: Any Establishment/Employer employing 20 or more persons
All employees except employees working in part-time position,apprentice and managerial position

name: Punjab
rules: Any Establishment/Employer employing 20 or more persons
All employees employed for hire/reward to do any work,skilled/unskilled,manual/clerical,in an establishment

name: Tamilnadu
rules: Any Establishment/Employer employing 5 or more persons
All employees except those in part-time,apprentice,managerial positions drawing wages more than ₹ 15,000 per month

name: Telangana
rules: Any Establishment/Employer employing 20 or more persons
All employees except employees in managerial/supervisory capacity drawing wages more than ₹ 1,600 per month

name: WestBengal
rules: Any Establishment/Employer employing 10 or more persons
All employees except employees in managerial/supervisory capacity drawing wages more than ₹ 1,600 per month
